pageTitle: OPTIEMUS INFRACOM LTD (OPIL:Mumbai): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {11551=Optiemus Infracom Limited, Board Meeting, May 30, 2015. Agenda: To consider audited standalone earnings results for the fourth quarter and full year and consolidated earnings results for the full year ended March 31, 2015., 4815=Optiemus Infracom Limited trades in mobile handsets and mobile accessories, and constructs road and highways in India and internationally. It operates through two segments, Mobile & Mobile Accessories and Construction of Road and Highways. The company distributes mobile handsets of the Samsung brand; and telecommunication headsets of the Plantronics brand, as well as mobile accessories, such as mobile pouches and screen guards under the MoLife brand. It also owns and leases a commercial property in located in Noida, Uttar Pradesh. The company was formerly known as Akanksha Cellular Limited and changed its name to Optiemus Infracom Limited in June 2011. Optiemus Infracom Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in New Delhi, India., 8971=Optiemus Infracom Limited reported audited standalone earnings results for the fourth quarter and full year and consolidated earnings results for the full year ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, on standalone basis, the company reported net sales of INR 7,534.5 million, profit from operation before other income, financial cost and exceptional items was INR 93.2 million, profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 63.1 million, net profit for the period was INR 41.9 million or INR 0.49 basic and diluted per share as compared to net sales of INR 9,163.5 million, profit from operation before other income, financial cost and exceptional items was INR 114.3 million, profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 160.0 million, net profit for the period was INR 112.7 million or INR 1.31 basic and diluted per share for the same period last year. For the full year, on standalone basis the company reported net sales of INR 25,462.7 million, profit from operation before other income, financial cost and exceptional items was INR 763.7 million, profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 451.4 million, net profit for the period was INR 296 million or INR 3.45 basic and diluted per share as compared to net sales of INR 40,800.1 million, profit from operation before other income, financial cost and exceptional items was INR 940.5 million, profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 767 million, net profit for the period was INR 501.1 million or INR 5.84 basic and diluted per share for the same period last year. For the full year, on consolidated basis the company reported net sales of INR 25,574.7 million, profit from operation before other income, financial cost and exceptional items was INR 736.2 million, profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 429.9 million, net profit for the period was INR 274.4 million or INR 3.18 basic and diluted per share as compared to net sales of INR 40,810.9 million, profit from operation before other income, financial cost and exceptional items was INR 893.1 million, profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 785.9 million, net profit for the period was INR 520.0 million or INR 6.06 basic and diluted per share for the same period last year.}
